description:
José Benitez


Monadical / Tucano AR


Social Networks:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/yojosebenitez
Github: https://github.com/josezy
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yojosebenitez/


The road so far on building a web platform for drones


Drones extend our vision of the world and allow us to see, sense and feel the environment in a new level of awesomeness. Imagine you are a scientist who needs to share the flight path and sensor readings of a drone experiment. Imagine you are a kid who can watch a scientist planning a flight path and see how the drone flies. Come to my talk to learn how I've built a web interface using Python to manage, examine, and share drone experiences, and get a glimpse of the world from above!


We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.
